simple_of_finrank_eq_one:
/-- Any `k`-algebra module which is 1-dimensional over `k` is simple. -/
theorem simple_of_finrank_eq_one {k : Type _} [Field k] [algebra k R] {V : Module R} (h : finrank k V = 1) : simple V :=
  (simple_iff_is_simple_module' V).mpr (is_simple_module_of_finrank_eq_one h)
#align simple_of_finrank_eq_one simple_of_finrank_eq_one
simple_iff_is_simple_module':
theorem simple_iff_is_simple_module' (M : Module R) : simple M ↔ is_simple_module R M :=
  (simple.iff_of_iso (of_self_iso M).symm).trans simple_iff_is_simple_module
#align simple_iff_is_simple_module' simple_iff_is_simple_module'
simple_iff_is_simple_module:
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Pierre-Alexandre Bazin. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Pierre-Alexandre Bazin, Scott Morrison
-/
theorem simple_iff_is_simple_module : simple (of R M) ↔ is_simple_module R M :=
  (simple_iff_subobject_is_simple_order _).trans (subobject_Module (of R M)).is_simple_order_iff
#align simple_iff_is_simple_module simple_iff_is_simple_module
